            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="45157"

            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has consistently exceeded client expectations, showcasing exceptional project management and technical execution. Clients praised their responsiveness and thoroughness, noting significant improvements in user experience and system performance. For instance, one client highlighted the reduction of page load times from 20 seconds to under 2 seconds and a 300% increase in sales after Designli&#39;s intervention. Their commitment to understanding client needs and delivering high-quality solutions has been a recurring theme in positive feedback.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="45157"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="170769"
          data-gtm_insight_id="731663"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & App Development for Education Platform Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 7, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Designli has <b>exceeded our expectations</b>; our project is complex, and we came to them with a lot of ideas, but they’ve been able to understand our needs and are building a fantastic design with an organized and user-friendly interface.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

    <div data-new-summary="true" class="provider__description">
        <div class="provider__project-highlight-text provider__project-highlight-text--summary sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed">
            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Developer Bazaar Technologies"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Developer Bazaar Technologies"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Developer Bazaar Technologies is a mobile app development company specializing in creating intuitive, scalable applications for various industries, including education, fintech, and wellness. Reviews highlight their expertise in mobile software development, with 100% of clients praising their project management skills, responsiveness, and commitment to client satisfaction. They are noted for their proactive approach and ability to deliver high-quality, user-friendly apps on time and within budget.
                <div class="provider__more-container">
                    <button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">

                    </button>
                </div>
            
        </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a highly proactive sentiment towards Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd., noting their collaborative approach and ability to suggest constructive improvements. One client highlighted the team&#39;s engagement and flexibility, stating they worked as partners rather than merely following directives. Their proactive nature was particularly evident in their responsiveness to client needs and their expertise in mobile app development, which contributed to the project&#39;s success and client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>

            >MindSea is a Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android development. Their reviews on Clutch.co indicate a strong reputation for effective project management and excellent communication, with 100% of reviewers highlighting their professionalism and integrity. Clients praise MindSea for seamlessly integrating with teams and delivering high-quality products on time and within budget, although some mention cost and resource estimation as areas for improvement.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
              data-gtm_insight_id="715156"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients praised their excellent project management, timely delivery, and high-quality outcomes. One client noted, &#39;The end quality exceeded my expectations,&#39; while another emphasized, &#39;MindSea went above and beyond.&#39; Their thorough processes and ability to adapt to client needs were also commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;They exceeded our expectations again.&#39; Overall, clients express strong satisfaction and a willingness to recommend MindSea for future projects.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="291296"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715156"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for Research Hospital</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 28, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Measureable outcomes were timeline of project, depth of detail, and suitability to our needs. They met and <b>exceeded all of these needs</b>. The company had excellent processes, and also was a delight to work with because of the professionalism and friendliness of all members of the team.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/mindsea/291296"
            title="View MindSea Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="291296"
            data-gtm_insight_id="715156"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="49598"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715156"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS & Android App Dev for Insurance Company</h5>

  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently noted Telescopic&#39;s proactive approach, particularly highlighting their Project Manager&#39;s responsiveness and support. One client emphasized that all developments and decisions were communicated effectively, eliminating perceived delays. Additionally, the team&#39;s ability to explain technical issues in layman&#39;s terms was appreciated, fostering a collaborative environment. Overall, clients felt included in the development process, which contributed to a strong partnership and satisfaction with the project&#39;s progression.
      </p>
    </div>

            </div>

The client emphasized the team&#39;s intelligence and innovative solutions that enhanced project outcomes, stating, &#39;some of their ideas saved us time and improved the final product.&#39; Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, with no identified areas for improvement.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Busy Human for exceeding their expectations, particularly in delivering impressive results. One client noted they aimed for 200 interactions but received 850, highlighting exceptional outcomes. The company&#39;s communication and responsiveness were frequently commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;Busy Human is by far the best in the way they communicate.&#39; Their expertise and proactive approach were also recognized, with clients expressing trust in their capabilities against larger competitors.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="808025"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="88048"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1969541"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Website & Web App Dev Services for Digital Marketing Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 5, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We were looking to get about 200 responses and interactions from potential customers through the website and web app; <b>we received 850</b>. <b>Our expectations were definitely exceeded</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

Overall, the sentiment surrounding SolveIt’s proactivity is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction with their responsiveness and commitment to project success.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praised Moze for their proactive approach throughout various projects. For instance, one client highlighted Moze&#39;s ability to manage all project aspects and provide valuable advice on decisions, while another noted their curiosity and engagement beyond project requirements. Additionally, their senior designer&#39;s direct communication with clients was appreciated, enhancing workflow efficiency. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Moze&#39;s initiative and thoroughness in addressing client needs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

            </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
              data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised their exceptional project management and technical expertise, noting that they delivered advanced features and met tight deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to engage hard-to-reach communities in challenging environments, while another commended their thorough communication and adaptability. Overall, clients expressed high satisfaction, recommending Appinventiv for its professionalism, dedication, and ability to provide value beyond initial projections.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="247469"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Mobile App Design & Development for Nonprofit Org</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 6, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Appinventiv has over-delivered from day one, and we have exceeded all our goals in very difficult circumstances, engaging users in remote and conflict affected parts of East Africa. Firstly, <b>Appinventiv were able to build advanced features into our minimum value project, well beyond anything that could have been reasonably expected</b>. Second, we were able to achieve the very difficult task of rolling out a trial in remote parts of South Sudan and Sudan, testing and enhancing as we went along.
            </p>
          </div>

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Synodus received overwhelmingly positive feedback for their proactive approach, exemplified by their responsiveness and flexibility in project management. Clients highlighted their ability to anticipate needs, as noted by the CEO of Whoop, who praised Synodus for introducing valuable features beyond initial specifications. Additionally, the Founder of Arctx commended their engagement throughout the development process, ensuring timely delivery and exceptional results. Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of satisfaction with Synodus’s proactive involvement in projects.
      </p>
    </div>

Overall, clients express high satisfaction, noting ease of collaboration and responsiveness to challenges, indicating that Grey Chain is not only a vendor but a true partner in achieving project success.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Dev for Home Improvement Company 
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Grey Chain has designed and developed a mobile app for a home improvement company’s sales process. The team has integrated APIs and built a custom CMS that stores product and pricing
        
        <a

            >PM Partners is an IT services company specializing in developing quality control tools, such as audio recording and analysis solutions for client interactions. They have received predominantly positive feedback, with notable praise for their professional project management and effective communication. One reviewer highlighted their expertise leading to successful project completion across multiple regions, despite minor challenges with cloud storage during a large-scale launch.

The company garners overwhelmingly positive feedback for its commitment to client success, proactive communication, and technical prowess, with 100% of reviewers praising their project management skills and dedication to fostering long-term partnerships. Clients particularly appreciate Techne.'s ability to deliver user-friendly and feature-rich applications that align with their business goals.

Another client praised the team&#39;s ability to elevate a simple idea into a polished app, stating they received far beyond what was anticipated. Overall, clients commend the exceptional communication, professionalism, and responsiveness throughout the project, leading to a sentiment of high satisfaction and strong recommendations.
      </p>

Another noted their proactive project management, timely delivery, and effective communication, which fostered a positive working relationship. Overall, feedback indicates a strong alignment with client goals and exceptional service delivery.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Custom Software Development for Forestry Technology Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Canadian Software Agency Inc has built custom software for a forestry technology firm. The team has designed and developed the product and handled backend development tasks. The software is for a VR

                    title="Read Full Review on Five Pack"

                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Five Pack is a distinguished mobile app development company that excels in iOS and Android development. Across numerous reviews, they stand out for their responsiveness, project management efficiency, and ability to integrate seamlessly with clients' teams, resulting in successful app launches and ongoing enhancements. Approximately 90% of reviewers highlight their professionalism and partnership approach, noting their capacity to deliver projects on time while accommodating evolving client needs.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Five Pack Creative&#39;s proactive approach throughout their projects. One client noted the team&#39;s responsiveness and ability to guide decisions, stating it felt like a partnership rather than a traditional vendor relationship. They appreciated how the project manager quickly coordinated with the team, ensuring efficient communication. However, a client mentioned that a tighter timeline limited their ability to address certain features proactively, although they acknowledged this was not a fault of Five Pack Creative.
      </p>
    </div>

        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised The Knights of Unity for their extensive knowledge and expertise in development. One client highlighted their ability to deliver a clean, well-documented codebase and noted the team&#39;s specialization in various areas, such as VR. The client appreciated the quick turnaround and high quality of work, emphasizing that partnering with them allowed access to a valuable knowledge base. Despite initial challenges in adapting to corporate billing practices, the team demonstrated a commitment to learning and improvement.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accessible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express high satisfaction with Beyond Enterprizes in terms of accessibility and communication. One client noted the team&#39;s willingness to accommodate special requests outside of regular hours, utilizing tools like Slack and WhatsApp for seamless interactions. They appreciated the structured communication approach, including periodic reports and weekly updates. Overall, the sentiment indicates that Beyond Enterprizes is highly accessible and responsive, contributing positively to the project&#39;s success.
      </p>
    </div>

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 18, 2022</span>
            </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Unique expertise
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Outline demonstrates unique expertise in Android development, as highlighted by a CTO who praised their strong architectural skills and technical competence. The lead architect&#39;s clear vision facilitated an efficient initial phase, leading to timely module completion. Despite some challenges in project management due to simultaneous module work, Outline&#39;s adaptability and communication were commendable, ensuring a collaborative and effective workflow.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          data-gtm_insight_id="811357"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Android App Development for Tennis Tech Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 2, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They’re definitely <b>very technically competent</b>, which made the initial phase of the project easy in comparison to other similar projects we've had. The lead architect had a <b>very clear vision of how to build the app</b>, and after some discussions and adjustments, it was clear what we were paying for very early on.
            </p>

        Reviews mention Puts the customer first
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Cloud&#43;&#43; B.V. demonstrates a strong commitment to customer-centricity, as highlighted by a CEO&#39;s feedback stating their impressive belief in the client&#39;s concept and their supportive role in its development. The client appreciated Cloud&#43;&#43;&#39;s alignment with their values and the effective communication throughout the project. Additionally, the agile approach facilitated adaptability to client needs, ultimately resulting in significant efficiency improvements. Overall, the sentiment reflects a positive experience with a focus on prioritizing client objectives.
      </p>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Transparent
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients commend IM Republic, Inc for their transparency and responsiveness throughout project engagements. One client highlighted their &#39;open, clear, and transparent&#39; leadership regarding project efforts, which fosters trust and collaboration. Additionally, their willingness to prioritize problem-solving over strict contractual obligations further reinforces their transparent approach. However, some clients suggested improvements in communication regarding team availability, indicating a need for better advance notice on resource leaves.
      </p>

These individuals are excellent in what they do, and their leadership is <b>open, clear, and transparent about the effort it would take to complete the project</b> at hand, showing a willingness to stay until it gets done.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1307651"

                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Micron demonstrated a proactive approach in project management, effectively establishing a timeline at the project&#39;s outset and maintaining open lines of communication. A client noted, &#39;Whenever I needed changes or had questions, it was easy to reach out to the project manager and get everything resolved quickly.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects satisfaction with their responsiveness and efficiency, contributing positively to the project&#39;s success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1307651"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="146166"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1019376"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>

The client appreciated the smooth commercial process and effective communication, emphasizing that additional requests were accommodated without extra charges. This successful collaboration, marked by timely delivery and consistent quality across multiple projects, underscores Creativsoft’s strong alignment with client values and goals.

The feedback emphasizes that Mindecs consistently goes &#39;the extra mile&#39; to deliver results and improve project outcomes, with no immediate areas for improvement identified by the client.

The reason for sticking to Softjourn is that they are the best company out of all the rest, <b>providing the best value and caring the most about the client's needs</b>.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Translate ideas into products
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a positive sentiment regarding Moberp&#39;s ability to translate ideas into products, noting their proficiency in integrating various tools into a cohesive ERP system. One client highlighted Moberp&#39;s comprehensive understanding of their processes, which facilitated a smooth implementation. The mobile integration was particularly praised for enhancing efficiency. Minor formatting issues in reports and slight timeline delays were mentioned, but overall, the feedback indicates strong satisfaction with Moberp&#39;s capabilities.
      </p>
    </div>

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
